message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you our amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
